title: Atlanta, Georgia.  A woman, who has come upon a mob abusing demonstrators with kicks, blows and burning cigarettes.  She holds the mob at bay and protects the demonstrators.
marks: \"#23\", in pencil, on back; \"Printer/Kelton/BLEAK B \"Danny Lyon\", in pencil, on back
description: large crowd of people in a city street; woman at right in a flowered dress confronts a smoking man at left
creditline: The Alfred and Ingrid Lenz Harrison Fund
